text:
Given that there is now sparse PCA and (sparse) dictionary learning, how about implementing _structured_ sparse PCA into the nilearn arsenal in the future?

cf.
http://arxiv.org/abs/0909.1440
title: Feature Request: Structured Sparse PCA

text: I would not make this a priority, because efficiency should be improved before going to more complex versions of sparse PCA. Also, it unclear to me what is the best suited structured dictionary: why not TV-l1 regularized ?

SSPCA could be interesting for unsupervised questions and TV-l1 for
supervised questions.
